participant_1.background:
I spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home.
My weight is not an issue for me
Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army.
i ve been in a relationship for 2 years.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.

participant_2.background:
I have a knack for making connections between seemingly unrelated things.
I've been in a relationship for 5 years, but I feel like I don't measure up to my partner's standards.
i have two sons that i am raising by myself.
I am relocating my troops to a new location.
my favorite hobby is gardening.

content.text: Hey there! Pretty good, how about yours?
Pretty good too. I am about to get my morning coffee. What are your plans for the day?
I am going to take my two sons to the park. They love playing in the playground.
That is so cute! I have no kids of my own, but I love hanging out with my nieces and nephews.
What do you do for a living?
I am a sniper in the army.
That is so cool! I always wanted to be in the military, but I had to stay home and raise my sons.
I understand. It is not an easy job, but it is very rewarding.
I am sure it is. I would love to hear more about your experiences.
Sure! I would love to tell you about some of my missions.
